sql_query: select t1.field0007 proNo,t1.field0044 proName,t.NAME,t2.SHOWVALUE,'售前' type
WHERE t.id = t1.field0054 and t1.field0077 = t2.ID
select t.field0002 proNo,t.field0010 proName,t1.NAME, t2.SHOWVALUE,IF(t.field0020 is null ,'公共','合同') type
LEFT JOIN org_member t1 on t.field0020 = t1.id
LEFT JOIN ctp_enum_item t2 on t.field0409 = t2.id
select t.field0033 proNo,t.field0002 proName,t1.NAME,t2.SHOWVALUE,'研发' type
LEFT JOIN org_member t1 on t.field0073 = t1.id
LEFT JOIN ctp_enum_item t2 on t.field0042 = t2.id
